attributes.action: consider extending the tube or DLR network to South East London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The tube and DLR networks currently serve North London, and South West London well, but is virtually non existant in South East London, in particular to areas such as Welling, Bexleyheath and Sidcup.

I would like the government to investigate the possibility of extending the jubilee line, or the DLR line to serve these areas which currently have no access to a tube or DLR network.
